summary.para: Enables the Web Report Designer to store information about data connections in an Azure Table storage.

member.name: M:DevExpress.XtraReports.Web.Azure.ReportDesigner.AzureReportDesignerContainer.UseAzureEnvironment(System.String)

summary.para: Enables the Web Report Designer to store information about data connections in an Azure Table storage.

member.param: A value, specifying the connection to Azure Cloud Storage.

summary.para: Enables the HTML5 Web Document Viewer and Web Report Designer to run on Microsoft Azure.

member.name: M:DevExpress.XtraReports.Web.Azure.WebDocumentViewer.AzureWebDocumentViewerContainer.UseAzureEnvironment(System.String)

summary.para: Enables the HTML5 Web Document Viewer and Web Report Designer to run on Microsoft Azure.

member.param: A value, specifying the connection to the Azure Cloud Storage.

member.name: M:DevExpress.XtraReports.Web.Azure.WebDocumentViewer.AzureWebDocumentViewerContainer.UseAzureEnvironment(System.String,System.String)

summary.para: Enables the HTML5 Web Document Viewer and Web Report Designer to run on Microsoft Azure.

member.param: A value, specifying the connection to the Azure Cloud Storage.
A System.String value, specifying the connection to the Azure Service Bus.

summary.para: If implemented, provides an Azure table storage customization service.
If implemented, returns a cloud table instance to store service information related to documents (newly created, as well as previously created ones).
If implemented, returns a cloud table instance to store service information related to opened reports.
If implemented, provides an Azure blob storage customization service.
If implemented, returns a cloud blob container instance used to create the required blob containers (if they have not yet been created).
If implemented, returns a cloud blob container instance where additional files should be saved (e.g., document images).
If implemented, returns a cloud blob container instance where generated report documents should be saved.
If implemented, returns a cloud blob container instance where report layouts should be saved.
Provides settings to clear a cache for storing documents and reports on Microsoft Azure.

member.name: M:DevExpress.XtraReports.Web.Azure.WebDocumentViewer.AzureCacheCleanerSettings.#ctor(System.TimeSpan,System.TimeSpan,System.TimeSpan,System.TimeSpan)

summary.para: Initializes a new instance of the AzureCacheCleanerSettings class with the specified settings.

member.param: A structure, specifying the time interval after which to run the cache cleaner (starting from the moment when the Web Document Viewer was loaded).
A structure, specifying the period of time between each cleaning of the cache.
A structure, specifying the lifetime of a report in the cache.
A structure, specifying the lifetime of a report document in the cache.

summary.para: Creates a new instance of the AzureCacheCleanerSettings class with the default settings.
Indicates the lifetime of a report document in the cache.
Indicates the lifetime of a report in the cache.
